chat.report.description:
[color=red]Befowe you awewt the modewatows, PWEASE WEAD:[/color]
If you'we just having pewsonyaw twoubwe with someonye, wight-cwick theiw nyame and ignyowe them.
Pwease make suwe what you'we wepowting is a viowation of the site's [url=https://wiki.f-list.net/Code_of_Conduct]Code of Conduct[/url], othewwise nyothing wiww be donye.

This toow is intended fow chat modewation. If you have a question, pwease visit ouw [url=https://wiki.f-list.net/Frequently_Asked_Questions]FAQ[/url] fiwst, and if that doesn't hewp, join [session=Helpdesk]Hewpdesk[/session] and ask youw question thewe.

If youw pwobwem wies anywhewe outside of the chat, pwease send in a Ticket instead.

Fow a mowe compwehensive guide as how and when to wepowt anyothew usew, pwease [url=https://wiki.f-list.net/How_to_Report_a_User]consuwt this page.[/url]

Pwease pwovide a bwief summawy of youw pwobwem and the wuwes that have been viowated.
[color=red]DO NYOT PASTE WOGS INTO THE "WEPOWT TEXT" FIEWD.
SEWECT THE TAB YOU WISH TO WEPOWT, WOGS AWE AUTOMATICAWWY ATTACHED[/color] OwO
chat.report.general: Nyo onye in pawticuwaw. If u wish to wepowt a specific usew, pwease wight-cwick them and sewect "Wepowt". OwO

commands.gkick.help: Wemuvs a chawactew fwom da chat. They awe fwee to wejoin - use /gban ow /gtimeout if u want to get wid of them fow a wongew pewiod of time. OwO

fixLogs.text:
Thewe awe a few weason wog fiwes can become cowwupted - wog fiwes fwom owd vewsions with bugs that have since been fixed ow incompwete fiwe opewations caused by computew cwashes awe da most common.
If onye of uw wog fiwes is cowwupted, u may get an "Unknyown Type" ewwow when u wog in ow when u open a specific tab. U may awso expewience othew issues.
This is nyot a toow u shouwd use if u'we nyot suwe it's absowutewy nyecessawy. It wiww go thwough and wewwite aww of uw wog fiwes.
Once this pwocess has stawted, do nyot intewwupt it ow uw wogs wiww get cowwupted even wowse. OwO
